# annotations

**Instance Property**

The annotations associated with the map view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var annotations: [any MKAnnotation] { get }
```

## Discussion

The objects in this array adopt the [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKAnnotation] protocol. If the map view has no associated annotations, the value of this property is an empty array.

## Annotating the map

- **addAnnotation(_:)**: Adds the specified annotation to the map view.
- **addAnnotations(_:)**: Adds an array of annotation objects to the map view.
- **removeAnnotation(_:)**: Removes the specified annotation object from the map view.
- **removeAnnotations(_:)**: Removes an array of annotation objects from the map view.
- **annotations(in:)**: Returns the annotation objects within the specified map rectangle.
